title: Greta goes Commie and Bono goes Capitalist
description:
Big changes this week for these two uneducated people trying to figure it all out…


Greta Thunberg used to say her goal was to protect the planet from climate change but she now admits it's to overthrow "the whole capitalist system," which she says is responsible for "imperialism, oppression, genocide.. racist, oppressive extractionism"https://t.co/MwzC3IRDn0

— Michael Shellenberger (@ShellenbergerMD) November 1, 2022


Bono: “I thought that if we just redistributed resources, then we could solve every problem. I now know that’s not true. There’s a funny moment when you realize that...the off-ramp out of extreme poverty is... commerce, it’s entrepreneurial capitalism.” https://t.co/ALI7vFl3VH

— Rand Paul (@RandPaul) November 4, 2022
author: contrarianmedia@hotmail.com (Mike Norman)
